short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful todo list extension for Chrome. Manage tasks with status tags, track progress dates, and export your tasks to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful todo list extension for Chrome. Manage tasks with status tags, track progress dates, and export your tasks to CSV. Features include color-coded task statuses, automatic date tracking, and alerts for overdue tasks.
